overview: Loosely based on 1957's "Our Sister Hedy" and 1961's "The Greatest Civil War on Earth", this romantic comedy follows the Wong household, where the father acts as the glue that holds everyone together while Mambo, the protagonist and third daughter, tries to get her other sisters hitched.
tagline: A Rojak of Relationships. Sweet, Spicy, Tangy.
title: Our Sister Mambo
